en: not (negative adverb that modifies first person singular possessives)

ngiemboon: Melɔ̌ɔn mɔɔn, é té mɔ́ɔn mɔ́.
en: These shoes don't belong to me.
This pepper doesn't belong to him.
not (with close future or tomorrow future)
not (with close future or tomorrow future)

ngiemboon: Múɔ kaa fàʼ faʼa, à těen nge ńjÿó mmó wɔ́.
en: The child has not worked, he will not eat.

ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn aa kwàʼ tèkǔ na nò
Múɔ wɔɔn aa kwàʼ tèkǔ na nò

en: The power of God is incomparable.
sound of a big stone falling on the ground

ngiemboon: Máa tóon gwě ssé lê têm.
Lejÿǒ tèm lemʉʼ à tè poŋ.
en: Taking advantage of misfortune is not good.
